attr.title: Hylics
attr.desc: Hylics is a surrealistic stop-motion style JRPG game created by Mason Lindroth. It boasts unique claymation graphics, RPG battles, and "overuse of random text generation", spread across 2+ hours of content. It's praised for its abstract, uncanny art style, as well as its alien atmosphere.
attr.desc_md: **Hylics** is a surrealistic stop-motion style **JRPG** game created by **Mason Lindroth**. It boasts unique **claymation** graphics, **RPG** battles, and "overuse of random text generation", spread across 2+ hours of content. It's praised for its abstract, uncanny art style, as well as its alien atmosphere.
attr.inst:
Buy the game on Steam or itch.io
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/397740/Hylics/
itch.io: https://mason-lindroth.itch.io/

Download it and copy all the files from the game folder into the portfolder. If you bought the game on itch.io, just put the .exe file into the portfolder.
attr.inst_md:
**Buy** the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/397740/Hylics/) or [itch.io](https://mason-lindroth.itch.io/hylics)

**Download** it and **copy** all the files from the **game folder** into the **portfolder**. If you bought the game on **itch.io**, just **put the .exe** file into the **portfolder**.
